description: A data model to support investment decision models in PowerSystemsInvestmentPortfolios

power_systems_type.description: maps to a valid PowerSystems.jl for PCM modeling

cluster.description: Number of the cluster when representing multiple clusters of a given technology in a given region.

available.description: identifies whether the technology is available

cofire_start_min.description: Minimum blending level of each fuel during start-up process for multi-fuel generator

cofire_start_max.description: Maximum blending level of each fuel during start-up process for multi-fuel generator

cofire_level_min.description: Minimum blending level of each fuel during normal generation process for multi-fuel generator

cofire_level_max.description: Maximum blending level of each fuel during normal generation process for multi-fuel generator

capital_costs.description: Capital costs for investing in a technology.

operation_costs.description: Fixed and variable O&M costs for a technology

unit_size.description: Used for discrete investment decisions. Size of each unit being built (MW)

maximum_capacity.description: Maximum allowable installed capacity for a technology

minimum_required_capacity.description: Minimum required capacity for a technology

outage_factor.description: Derating factor to account for planned or forced outages of a technology

min_generation_percentage.description: Minimum generation as a fraction of total capacity

ramp_up_percentage.description: Maximum increase in output between operation periods. Fraction of total capacity

ramp_dn_percentage.description: Maximum decrease in output between operation periods. Fraction of total capacity

up_time.description: Minimum amount of time a resource has to stay in the committed state.

down_time.description: Minimum amount of time a resource has to remain in the shutdown state.

start_cost_per_mw.description: Cost per MW of nameplate capacity to start a generator (/MW per start).

start_fuel_mmbtu_per_mw.description: Startup fuel use per MW of nameplate capacity of each generator (MMBtu/MW per start)

rsv_cost.description: Cost of providing upwards spinning or contingency reserves

reg_max.description: Fraction of nameplate capacity that can committed to provided regulation reserves

rsv_max.description: Fraction of nameplate capacity that can committed to provided upwards spinning or contingency reserves.

retirement_potential.description: Individual generation units mapped to a technology that are eligible for retirement
Amount of pre-existing capacity for a technology that is eligible for retirement

retrofit_potential.description: Individual generation units mapped to this technology that can be retrofitted

retrofit_id.description: Unique identifier to group retrofittable source technologies with retrofit options inside the same zone.

retrofit_potential.description: Amount of existing capacity for technology that can be retrofitted

retrofit_fraction.description: Fraction of existing capacity that is eligible for retrofits. Alternative to retrofit_potential

existing_capacity.description: List of individual units to map to a specific SupplyTechnology

available.description: identifies whether the technology is available

power_systems_type.description: maps to a valid PowerSystems.jl for PCM modeling

capital_costs_energy.description: Capital costs for investing in a technology.

capital_costs_power.description: Capital costs for investing in a technology.

om_costs_energy.description: Fixed and variable O&M costs for a technology

om_costs_power.description: Fixed and variable O&M costs for a technology

existing_cap_power.description: Pre-existing power capacity for a technology (MW)

existing_cap_energy.description: Pre-existing energy capacity for a technology (MWh)

initial_state_of_charge.description: State of charge for storage technology in the first timepoint (MWh).

unit_size_power.description: Used for discrete investment decisions. Size of each unit being built (MW)

unit_size_energy.description: Used for discrete investment decisions. Size of each unit being built (MW)

max_cap_power.description: Maximum allowable installed power capacity for a storage technology

max_cap_energy.description: Maximum allowable installed energy capacity for a storage technology

min_cap_power.description: Minimum required power capacity for a storage technology

min_cap_energy.description: Minimum required energy capacity for a storage technology

min_duration.description: Minimum required durection for a storage technology

max_duration.description: Maximum allowable durection for a storage technology

rsv_cost.description: Cost of providing upwards spinning or contingency reserves

reg_max.description: Fraction of nameplate capacity that can committed to provided regulation reserves

rsv_max.description: Fraction of nameplate capacity that can committed to provided upwards spinning or contingency reserves.

available.description: identifies whether the technology is available

power_systems_type.description: maps to a valid PowerSystems.jl for PCM modeling

technology_efficiency.description: MWh of electricity per unit of output. Ex: MWh per ton of hydrogen for electrolyzers

price_per_unit.description: Price or value per unit of output. Ex: USD per ton of hydrogen for electrolyzers

min_power.description: Minimum operation of demandside unit as a fraction of total capacity

ramp_up_percentage.description: Maximum increase in output between operation periods. Fraction of total capacity

ramp_dn_percentage.description: Maximum decrease in output between operation periods. Fraction of total capacity

available.description: identifies whether the technology is available

power_systems_type.description: maps to a valid PowerSystems.jl for PCM modeling

curtailment_cost.description: Fraction of VOLL for curtailment cost

max_demand_curtailment.description: percent of demand that can be curtailed in that segment

available.description: identifies whether the technology is available

power_systems_type.description: maps to a valid PowerSystems.jl for PCM modeling

max_demand_delay.description: Maximum number of hours that demand can be deferred or delayed (hours).

max_demand_advance.description: Maximum number of hours that demand can be scheduled in advance of the original schedule (hours).

demand_energy_efficiency.description: Energy efficiency associated with time shifting demand. Represents energy losses due to time shifting

var_cost_per_mwh.description: Variable operations and maintenance costs associated with flexible demand deferral

available.description: identifies whether the technology is available

power_systems_type.description: maps to a valid PowerSystems.jl for PCM modeling

maximum_new_capacity.description: Maximum capacity that can be added to transmission line (MW)

capital_cost.description: Cost of adding new capacity to the inter-regional transmission line.

line_loss.description: Transmission loss for each transport technology (%)

capital_recovery_factor.description: Capital recovery period (in years) used for determining overnight capital costs from annualized investment costs for network transmission line expansion.

maximum_new_capacity.description: Maximum capacity that can be added to transmission line (MW)

capital_cost.description: Cost of adding new capacity to the inter-regional transmission line.

line_loss.description: Transmission loss for each transport technology (%)

capital_recovery_factor.description: Capital recovery period (in years) used for determining overnight capital costs from annualized investment costs for network transmission line expansion.

maps to a valid PowerSystems.jl for PCM modeling

eligible_zones.description: List of regions that contribute to the carbon cap constraint.

co_2_max_tons_mwh.description: Emission limit in terms of rate (tCO@/MWh)

co_2_max_mtons.description: Emission limit in absolute values, in Million of tons

power_systems_type.description: maps to a valid PowerSystems.jl for PCM modeling

eligible_resources.description: List of resources that contribute to the carbon cap constraint.

min_mw.description: Minimum total capacity across all eligible resources

pricecap.description: price threshold for policy constraint, USD/MW

id.description: A unique zone identification number (positive integer)
